dict.string:
Changelog: 2.3b2 - Much improved queue management (fewer connections) - Menu item 'Download As...' - Editing multiple files in the external editor with the same name - Resume downloads (SFTP) - Resume uploads (SFTP) - Resume uploads (FTP) - Drag files onto bookmark to quickly upload - Bookmarks are shown in the menu - 'Apply to all' checkbox in dialog asking for replace/resume/skip existing files - Warning if a duplicate exists is also shown when uploading files - Improved caching of directory listings - When dropping files onto folders it will upload these into the folder - When typing the first leter of a file it gets selected in the browser - Toolbar button to remove all completed items from the queue - Convert line endings when downloading in ASCII mode (FTP) - Auto transfer mode (FTP) - Bug fixes
2.3b1 - External editor support
